entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
